ICH **DATE[Mar 2004]
Chronic Pain
Subjective / Events Overnight :
Pt states this AM she had another " crisis ."
C/o Bilat UE pain .
Pt also states , " I took my 1st step yesterday ."
Physical Exam
General Appearance :
Middle aged AA female in NAD .
Cardiovascular :
S1 , S2 , M .
IRRR .
Respiratory :
Improved breath sounds , but conts with scattered rhonchi throughout ; neg tachypnea .
Gastrointestinal :
+ BS , soft , protuberant .
Musculoskeletal :
+ 2 B LE edema ankle to thigh .
+ 2 B UE edema , greater RUE .
Neurological :
Improved mental status - AAO .
Cont ext weakness .

MCHC 32.3 gm / dL Low

ABS Lymphs 0.71 X10E+09 / L Low
ABS Monocytes 1.18 X10E+09 / L High
ABS Eosinophils 0.00 X10E+09 / L
ABS Basophils 0.00 X10E+09 / L
Type of Differential
Manual Differential
RBC Morphology
RBC Morphology
Impression and Plan
Plan
Heme - h/o SCA .
Admitted in crisis .
On Aranesp .
Pallative Care assisting with the adjustment of pain meds - Oxycontin and prn IV Morphine - cont same for today .
Pulmonary - h/o asthma - Duonebs prn ; PNA - Cefepime D/c 'd - completed full course .
IV hydrocortisone - Cont to taper .
HEENT - Group A Strep Throat - Completed 10 day Amoxil course .
Otalgia / inc. hearing loss - ENT c/s - Floxin Otic - completed course .
Improved hearing .
Cards - A fib - Cardizem ( when BP parameters allow ) .
FEN - Soft diet .
GI - Hepatic encephalopathy - Lactulose BID .
Monitor ammonia level .
Renal - **INITIALS - Daily dosing of IV Lasix ( no IV Lasix today ) - monitor CXR .
Appreciate Renal c/s - Renal US - IMPRESSION :
1. ECHOGENIC KIDNEYS COMPATIBLE WITH RENAL PARENCHYMAL DISEASE , WHICH CORRELATES WITH RECENT ABDOMINAL MR FINDINGS .
2. NO HYDRONEPHROSIS .
3. SMALL TO MODERATE PELVIC ASCITES .
PhosLo .
Sodium bicarb prn b/c of concern of the sodium .
No HD today .
Repeat U/A , UCS due to elevated WBC .
Neuro - Diffuse weakness of ext - CTH negative .
PT / OT .
Vasc - RUE swelling and pain - RUE doppler prelim neg .
Proph - SQ Heparin .
ID - Leukocytosis - UCS Pending .
CXR and blood cultures ordered .
Taper IV
Steroids .
? secondary to SSC .
Disposition - Pending .
Pt does not want to go to SNF .
Could consider Rehab ( ie Montefiore ) for 1 wk .
Consider PM&amp ; R consult once Pt closer to D/c .
Family contacts :
Daughter **NAME[VVV] **PHONE ( **PLACE ); Mother **PLACE **PHONE ( Arizona ) .
Professional Services
Credentials and Title of Author **NAME[UUU] Signing this Document : PA-C
Perform by **NAME[XXX  , WWW] M
( on **DATE[Apr 23 2007] 14:11 )
Sign by **NAME[XXX  , WWW] M
( on **DATE[Apr 23 2007] 14:11 )
VERIFY by **NAME[XXX  , WWW] M
( on **DATE[Apr 23 2007] 14:11 )
